short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View detailed information about images on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
Easily access detailed information about any image on the web with Image Info Viewer for Chrome! This user-friendly extension lets you right-click on an image to view all its critical details in a sleek popup window.

What You Can Discover:

File Name: See the image's name and extension.
File Type & MIME Type: Identify formats like JPEG, PNG, GIF, etc.
File Size: Check the size of the image in kilobytes.
Dimensions: Get both the displayed and original (natural) image dimensions.
Date & Metadata: See when the image was accessed and any available metadata.
Alt Text & Title: Learn how the image is described for accessibility and SEO.
Source & Page URL: Quickly visit the image’s source or the containing webpage.
Camera Info & Color Profile: View advanced technical details like orientation and color properties.
Key Features:

Intuitive popup with an easy-to-read layout.
Download option for saving images directly from the popup.
Text wrapping ensures clean display of long information.
Supports most image types, including those used as background images.
Whether you're a developer, designer, researcher, or just curious about images, Image Info Viewer for Chrome is your ultimate tool for exploring the images you see online.

How to Use:

Right-click on any image in your browser.
Choose "View Image Details" from the context menu.
Instantly view a popup with all the image details you need.
Explore the story behind every image—download Image Info Viewer for Chrome today!
